Offense is the best defense. Okay... even if this is not always true, having an awesome sword to slay those monsters is calming.

The neon crystals have the interesting effect of destroying living tissue. I recently got the idea to use this effect to make effective weapons, but I don't want them to break like iron swords. Thats why I designed a special sword handle.

Two neon coils are switched on and off very quickly so the dust and the blade starts vibrating. This micro vibration results in preventing damaging to the blade when something is cut. But the internal battery is drained with each cut.
Thanks to the special abilities of pure neon, this sword has a chance to paralyze the opponent on critical hits.
